data.name: RichTextBox2.Text
data.value: T&C: 1. Interest Rate: The interest rate on the loan will be determined based on the prevailing market rates at the time of approval. This rate may be fixed for a specified period or subject to change periodically based on market conditions. Any changes in the interest rate will be notified to the borrower in advance. 2. Repayment Schedule: The borrower agrees to repay the loan amount along with interest according to the agreed-upon repayment schedule. Payments are to be made on a monthly basis, commencing from the date of disbursement of the loan. Failure to make timely payments may result in penalties or default consequences. 3. Collateral and Security: The property being financed will serve as collateral for the loan. In the event of default, the bank reserves the right to exercise its lien on the property and undertake foreclosure proceedings to recover the outstanding loan amount.

data.name: RichTextBox4.Text
data.value: T&C: 1. Interest Rate: The interest rate on the loan will be determined based on the prevailing market rates at the time of approval. Any changes in the interest rate will be notified to the borrower in advance. 2. Repayment Schedule: The borrower agrees to repay the loan amount along with interest according to the agreed-upon repayment schedule. Payments are to be made on a monthly basis, commencing from the date of disbursement of the loan. Failure to make timely payments may result in penalties or default consequences. 3. Course and Institution Eligibility: The loan is provided for specific educational programs and institutions approved by the bank. The borrower agrees to provide accurate information regarding the course of study, institution, and other relevant details. Any changes to the course or institution may require approval from the bank and could affect the terms of the loan.

data.name: RichTextBox6.Text
data.value: T&C: 1. Loan Disbursement: The loan amount will be disbursed directly to the borrower's designated bank account upon approval. Disbursement may be subject to the submission of necessary documents and verification of identity and income. 2. Repayment Schedule: The borrower agrees to repay the loan amount along with interest according to the agreed-upon repayment schedule. Payments are to be made on a monthly basis, commencing from the date of disbursement of the loan. Failure to make timely payments may result in penalties or default consequences. 3. Loan Purpose Restrictions: The borrower agrees to use the loan proceeds only for the stated purpose and not for illegal, speculative, or prohibited activities. Any deviation from the approved purpose may result in default consequences and legal action by the bank.

data.name: RichTextBox8.Text
data.value: T&C: 1. Collateral: The vehicle being financed will serve as collateral for the loan. In the event of default, the bank reserves the right to repossess the vehicle and undertake legal proceedings to recover the outstanding loan amount. 2. Loan Amount and Tenure: The borrower agrees to repay the loan amount in regular installments over a specified period, typically ranging from 1 to 7 years. The loan amount and tenure will be determined based on factors such as the borrower's income, credit history, and the value of the vehicle. 3. Insurance Requirements: The borrower is required to maintain comprehensive insurance coverage for the financed vehicle throughout the loan tenure. The insurance policy should cover risks such as theft, damage, and third-party liability. The bank may require proof of insurance coverage before disbursing the loan amount.

data.name: RichTextBox10.Text
data.value: T&C: 1. Interest Rate: The interest rate on the loan will be determined based on the borrower's creditworthiness, the type of business, industry risk factors, and prevailing market rates at the time of approval. This rate may be fixed or variable and will be applied to the outstanding loan balance. 2. Repayment Schedule: The borrower agrees to repay the loan amount along with interest according to the agreed-upon repayment schedule. Failure to make timely payments may result in penalties or default consequences. 3. Loan Amount and Purpose: The borrower agrees to use the loan amount for the specified business purposes outlined in the loan agreement, such as working capital, equipment purchase, expansion, or other approved uses. The loan amount will be determined based on the borrower's business plan, financial projections, and the bank's assessment of creditworthiness.
